name: Xgen Motorsports Racing
description:
Welcome to Xgen Motorsports, a new race car driving company. Join Agent Hotman as he puts his car, the G7 Exploratorem, through its paces in order to qualify for the company's first race!

Controls:

Accelerate: Up arrow

Brake/Reverse: Down arrow

Turn left: Left arrow

Turn right: Right arrow

Wear your seat belt!
